weekly_top_story.headline: France pledges up to 100 fighter jets and advanced defense systems to Ukraine amid ongoing conflict
weekly_top_story.summary: France has committed to supplying Ukraine with up to 100 fighter jets along with advanced air defense systems, drones, and munitions, signaling strengthened international military support amid Russia's sustained aerial assaults on Kyiv, which have intensified the ongoing conflict and global security concerns.

stories.headline: UN Security Council approves US-led plan for international stabilization force in Gaza
stories.summary: The UN Security Council approved a US-proposed ceasefire and the establishment of an international stabilization force tasked with delivering aid, protecting civilians, and disarming Hamas in Gaza, marking a significant step in addressing the humanitarian crisis and regional stability.

stories.headline: US President Donald Trump removes tariffs on hundreds of food products ahead of Thanksgiving
stories.summary: President Trump announced the removal of tariffs on hundreds of food products to mitigate inflationary pressures at grocery stores in the US, responding to consumer affordability concerns following recent Democratic electoral gains.

stories.headline: Canada, US, and Finland form partnership to strengthen Arctic icebreaker fleet
stories.summary: Canada, the United States, and Finland announced a trilateral pact to bolster their Arctic icebreaker capabilities, enhancing navigation, security, and environmental monitoring amid increasing geopolitical and climate challenges in the Arctic region.
